original_text: The disciple that Jesus loved said to Peter, ‘It is the Lord!’ When Simon Peter heard him say, ‘It is the Lord,’ he put on his coat. (He had been wearing only a few clothes.) Then he jumped into the water.
korean_text: 예수께서 사랑하시는 그 제자가 베드로에게 이르되 주님이시라 하니 시몬 베드로가 벗고 있다가 주님이라 하는 말을 듣고 겉옷을 두른 후에 바다로 뛰어 내리더라

sentences.original_text: The disciple that Jesus loved said to Peter
When Simon Peter heard him say
sentences.korean_translation: 시몬 베드로가 그의 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: He had been wearing only a few clothes
Then he jumped into the water
